pages.text: Life Essence is all fine and good in the altar, where it can be used for crafting or funnelled into an $(l:bloodmagic:altar/soul_network)Orb$() to power Rituals, but what if you want to build a moat of the stuff around your $(l:bloodmagic:utility/incense_altar)Incense Altar$()? Fortunarely, extracting $(item)Life Essence$() is relatively trivial. Simply place a $(item)Bucket$() in the Blood Altar and wait a few seconds for it to fill up. 1LP=1mb, so 1,000LP should be plenty for your Bucket.

pages.heading: Bucket of Life
pages.text: $(italic)It's definitely not blood. Blood would have coagulated by now. $(br2)... Why are you looking at me like that?$()
